Package transport

Interface IManagement

  • public interface IManagement

    Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG)
    Politécnico do Porto (PP)
    Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI)
    Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
    Paradigmas de Programação (PP)
    2019 / 2020

    Contract representing API management behaviour.

    Authors:

    • @author Ricardo Santos
    • @author Bruno Oliveira
    • @author Fábio Silva
    • @author João Ramos
    • @author Óscar Oliveira

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        boolean addItem​(IItem item)
         throws ManagementException
        Adds a new item to be delivered
        Parameters:
        item - item to be delivered
        Returns:
        true if the item is inserted, false if the item already exists
        Throws:
        ManagementException - if
        1. item status is not NON_DELIVERED
        2. item is null
        3. item has no transportation type

      • removeItem

        boolean removeItem​(IItem item)
            throws ManagementException
        Removes an item
        Parameters:
        item - item to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the item is removed, false if the item doesn't exist
        Throws:
        ManagementException - if the parameter is null

                    TransportationTypes transportationType)

        Parameters:
        status - status for retrieving vehicles
        transportationType - transportion type for retrieving vehicles
        Returns:
        Returns a copy of all vehicle fleet with given status and transportion type

      • addDelivery

        boolean addDelivery​(IDelivery delivery)
             throws ManagementException
        Adds a new delivery in the system. All Items of the delivery must have previously been created in the system and must have a ASSIGNED.
        Parameters:
        delivery - delivery to be inserted in the system
        Returns:
        true if the delivery is inserted, false if the delivery already exists
        Throws:
        ManagementException - if
        1. delivery is null
        2. delivery with items not in the system
        3. delivery with items with status not ASSIGNED
        4. delivery has no items or the items cannot be stored inside the vehicle
        5. delivery has no vehicle or cannot transport specific items
        6. delivery has no driver or cannot drive the specific vehicle

      • deliveredItem

        void deliveredItem​(java.lang.String idDelivery,
                   java.lang.String reference)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Confirms a delivered item. The item must have a state of ASSIGNED. Item status must be changed to DELIVERED
        Parameters:
        idDelivery - delivery id
        reference - item reference
        Throws:
        ManagementException - if
        1. delivery or item is null
        2. delivery or item is invalid
        3. Item do not have a ASSIGNED status
        java.lang.Exception

      • deliveredItem

        void deliveredItem​(java.lang.String idDelivery,
                   IDestination destination)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Confirms delivered items to a given destination. The items must have a previous state of ASSIGNED. Items status must be changed to DELIVERED
        Parameters:
        idDelivery - delivery id
        destination - items destination
        Throws:
        ManagementException - if
        1. delivery or item is null
        2. delivery or item is invalid
        3. Item do not have a ASSIGNED status
        java.lang.Exception

      • checkItemStatus

        ItemStatus checkItemStatus​(java.lang.String reference)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Checks the state of a item in the system.
        Parameters:
        reference - item reference
        Returns:
        status of the item
        Throws:
        ManagementException - if the item does not exist
        java.lang.Exception
